properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER
   TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGRESS ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      06-05.50N 050-15.73W AND 03-51.33N 047-43.15W.
   B. 17 JUN ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      06-05.27N 050-15.73W AND 03-51.33N 047-43.15W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 18 JUN.
